definitions.title: n.f. fastness, stronghold
definitions.body: ;—abs. ´[[מ]] 1Sa 22:4 +, [[מְחֻדֶה]] 2Sa 5:9, cstr. [[מְחֻדַת]] v:2Sa 5:7; sf. [[מְחוּדָתִי]] Ps 18:3 +, [[מְחֻדָתִי]] 2Sa 22:2; pl. [[מְחוּדוֹת]] Ps 31:3; —fastness of David, 1Sa 22:4, 1Sa 22:5, 1Sa 24:22 (Gi v:22) 2Sa 5:17, 2Sa 23:14 = 1Ch 11:16; rd. also [[מְחֻדַת עֲדֻלָּם]] 1Sa 22:1, 2Sa 23:13, 1Ch 11:15, for MT [[מְעָדַת]] (v. [[מְעָרָה]] p. 79:2 b); of Jerus., [[מְחֻדַת חִיּוֹן]] 2Sa 5:7 = 1Ch 11:5, cf. 2Sa 5:9; home of eagle Job 39:28 (+ [[שֶׁן־סֶלַע]]); elsewhere fig. of ´[[י]] Ps 18:3=2Sa 22:2, Ps 31:4, Ps 71:3 (all + [[סַלְעִי]]), Ps 91:2 (+ [[מַחְסִי]]), Ps 144:2 (+[[חַסְדִּי]], but this dub., Krochm Gr Che [[חִסְנִי]], Dy [[חִזְקִ]], Du [[סַלְעִי]]; poss. is [[מַתְסִי]]); also [[כֵּית מְחוּדוֹת]] Ps 31:8.
